creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: small upper section with applique square with ovals and scallops in red, blue, green and black; bottom section has black center with abstract applique; blue side borders cross stitched in pink and red; bottom red border cross stitched with green silk embroidered patches at corners; 4"-6" rolled strings at bottom corners
title: Baby Carrier
